mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ENROLL_DATE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, PHONE, MEMBER_DEL_FL, AUTHORITY FROM "MEMBER"
mapper.update: UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address}, MEMBER_DEL_FL = #{memberDelFl}, AUTHORITY = #{authority} WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT RECORD_NO, TO_CHAR(RECORD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RECORD_DATE, ACCEPTOR_NO, MEMBER_NAME "ACCEPTOR_NAME" FROM DONATION_RECORD LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" ON(MEMBER_NO = ACCEPTOR_NO) WHERE DONATOR_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY RECORD_NO
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME FROM DONATION_PRODUCT WHERE RECORD_NO = #{recordNo}
SELECT ACCEPTOR_NO FROM DONATION_RECORD WHERE RECORD_NO = #{recordNo}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS FROM "MEMBER" WHERE AUTHORITY = 2

SELECT C_NO, MEMBER_ID, CERTIFICATION_ID, TO_CHAR(MEMBER_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEMBER_BIRTH, PHONE, MEMBER_NAME, ADDRESS, MEMBER_NO, TO_CHAR(C_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS C_DATE FROM CERTIFICATION ORDER BY C_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CERTIFICATION SET MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}, CERTIFICATION_ID = #{certificationId}, MEMBER_BIRTH = #{memberBirth}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address} WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
